title: Oasis Restaurant and German Bakery
description: Menu consists of Indian & international food plus assorted baked goods. English menu. There are 2 floors of casual seating. Frequented by travelers. Expensive prices by local standard but affordable for foreigners. Located on the main part of town where you can see a sign for it from the bridge; or just ask someone.
streetAddress: 3rd floor, Ishan Hotel, Laxman Jhula village
